title: Zacks: Analysts Expect Cedar Fair, L.P. (FUN) to Post -$1.47 EPS
content:
Blackbaud, Inc. (BLKB) Expected to Announce Earnings of $0.50 Per Share Zacks: Analysts Expect Cedar Fair, L.P. (FUN) to Post -$1.47 EPS April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on Zacks: Analysts Expect Cedar Fair, L.P. (FUN) to Post -$1.47 EPS - Filed Under - by Jeff Wilder Tweet
Brokerages expect that Cedar Fair, L.P. (NYSE:FUN) will report earnings of ($1.47) per share for the current quarter, according to Zacks Investment Research . Seven analysts have made estimates for Cedar Fair’s earnings, with the highest EPS estimate coming in at ($1.40) and the lowest estimate coming in at ($1.55). Cedar Fair posted earnings per share of ($1.27) in the same quarter last year, which suggests a negative year-over-year growth rate of 15.7%. The company is scheduled to report its next earnings results on Wednesday, May 1st.
According to Zacks, analysts expect that Cedar Fair will report full year earnings of $3.30 per share for the current year, with EPS estimates ranging from $3.20 to $3.35. For the next year, analysts expect that the firm will report earnings of $3.52 per share, with EPS estimates ranging from $3.41 to $3.60. Zacks Investment Research’s EPS calculations are a mean average based on a survey of sell-side research analysts that that provide coverage for Cedar Fair. Get Cedar Fair alerts:
Cedar Fair (NYSE:FUN) last posted its earnings results on Wednesday, February 13th. The company reported ($0.40) EPS for the quarter, missing the consensus estimate of $0.19 by ($0.59). The firm had revenue of $249.80 million during the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $243.23 million. Cedar Fair had a net margin of 9.39% and a return on equity of 22,432.99%. Cedar Fair’s revenue for the quarter was up 9.5% compared to the same quarter last year. During the same quarter in the prior year, the business posted $1.01 earnings per share. Several equities analysts have commented on FUN shares. SunTrust Banks reiterated a “hold” rating and issued a $54.00 target price on shares of Cedar Fair in a research report on Monday, December 24th. Zacks Investment Research upgraded Cedar Fair from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating and set a $53.00 target price for the company in a research report on Monday, December 24th. Finally, TheStreet upgraded Cedar Fair from a “c+” rating to a “b-” rating in a research report on Thursday, January 31st. Four equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and five have issued a buy rating to the company. The stock presently has a consensus rating of “Buy” and a consensus price target of $60.83.
A number of hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of the business. Deutsche Bank AG boosted its position in Cedar Fair by 146.1% in the fourth quarter. Deutsche Bank AG now owns 166,750 shares of the company’s stock worth $7,887,000 after purchasing an additional 99,000 shares during the last quarter. American Century Companies Inc. bought a new stake in shares of Cedar Fair in the fourth quarter valued at $2,256,000. Belpointe Asset Management LLC raised its stake in shares of Cedar Fair by 11.3% in the fourth quarter. Belpointe Asset Management LLC now owns 10,316 shares of the company’s stock valued at $488,000 after buying an additional 1,044 shares during the period. Aurora Investment Counsel raised its stake in shares of Cedar Fair by 11.0% in the fourth quarter. Aurora Investment Counsel now owns 46,753 shares of the company’s stock valued at $2,211,000 after buying an additional 4,618 shares during the period. Finally, Advisory Services Network LLC raised its stake in shares of Cedar Fair by 26.7% during the 4th quarter. Advisory Services Network LLC now owns 2,049 shares of the company’s stock valued at $97,000 after purchasing an additional 432 shares during the period. 51.17% of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds.
Cedar Fair stock opened at $52.11 on Wednesday. The company has a quick ratio of 0.72, a current ratio of 0.85 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 51.13. The stock has a market capitalization of $2.95 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 17.25, a PEG ratio of 2.63 and a beta of 0.57. Cedar Fair has a 12 month low of $45.73 and a 12 month high of $67.85.
The firm also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend, which was paid on Wednesday, March 20th. Shareholders of record on Monday, March 11th were given a $0.925 dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Friday, March 8th. This represents a $3.70 annualized dividend and a yield of 7.10%. Cedar Fair’s dividend payout ratio is currently 122.52%.
Cedar Fair Company Profile
Cedar Fair, L.P. owns and operates amusement and water parks, and hotels in the United States and Canada. The company operates approximately 11 amusement parks, 2 outdoor water parks, 1 indoor water park, and 4 hotels. Its amusement parks include Cedar Point located on Lake Erie between Cleveland and Toledo in Sandusky, Ohio; Knott's Berry Farm near Los Angeles, California; Canada's Wonderland near Toronto, Canada; Kings Island near Cincinnati, Ohio; Carowinds in Charlotte, North Carolina; Dorney Park & Wildwater Kingdom in Allentown, Pennsylvania; Kings Dominion located near Richmond, Virginia; California's Great America located in Santa Clara, California; Valleyfair located near Minneapolis/St.

title: UK Authorities, Resistance continue search for Brexit Strategy
content:
PFS Investments Inc. Has $7.17 Million Position in VanEck Vectors High Yield Municipal Index ETF (HYD) UK Authorities, Resistance continue search for Brexit Strategy April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on UK Authorities, Resistance continue search for Brexit Strategy - Filed Under - by Stacy Sanders Tweet
The British authorities and senior opposition figures had been meeting Thursday in quest of a new strategy on how the country leaves the European Union, as from breaking up her Party Prime Minister Theresa May attempted to stop her shift.
After she agreed to discussions with Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn, who favors a softer form of Brexit than that advocated by the 31,, may confronted fury. Get alerts:
May and Corbyn met for two hours Wednesday, with both sides calling talks”constructive.” Labour and government teams planned detailed negotiations Thursday. Even the cross-party talks are risky together with every party split down the middle over Brexit.
Labour is officially dedicated to enacting the voters’ decision to leave the EU, but lots of the lawmakers of the party want. They’ll be mad if the party knowingly helps lead to the U.K.’s departure.
Pro-Brexit Conservatives are angry at the prospect of a Brexit that keeps Britian jump closely into EU trade rules and rules.
Treasury leader Philip Hammond stated both parties required to be more flexible to violate the Brexit impasse.
“When you enter a negotiation like this to find a compromise way ahead, both parties need to give something up,” he told ITV television. “There will be pain on both sides.”
Britain’s governmental paralysis across Brexit has left the country facing a potential departure from the EU in just a week.
Following U.K. lawmakers three times rejected an agreement struck between the bloc and might late last season, the EU gave Britain until April 12 to approve a withdrawal agreement, alter course and seek a further delay to Brexit, or wreck out of the bloc free of deal to cushion the shock.
Business leaders and economists warn that a no-deal Brexit would cause huge disruption to travel and trade, together with tariffs and customs tests resulting in gridlock at shortages of merchandise and ports.
Lawmakers desperate to avert a exit have captured control of the parliamentary agenda to pass a drafted bill that compels May to ask for an extension to the Brexit deadline when a no-deal departure is looming.
The bill was being debated Thursday at the upper chamber, the House of Lords of Parliament, and had been approved by the House of Commons by a vote.
Pro-Brexit lawmakers condemned the bill in an attempt to frustrate Brexit.
Members of the House of Lords were anticipated to filibuster and utilize delaying tactics to try and impede the development of the bill during the chamber.
The Brexit spokeswoman from the Lords of Labour, dianne Hayter, stated she was ready to debate all night and day if would like to get through it.
“If that’s what it takes to do exactly what the elected House of Commons asked us to do, that is what we can do,” she said.
If the bill passes into law, May will need to attend a EU Brexit summit in Brussels on April 10 to look for a delay.
The EU isn’t forced to agree. Leaders of this bloc, exasperated by the chaos in London, say they’ll only grant a delay if Britain includes a new plan that is viable.
Worries about a no-deal Brexit are particularly acute in Ireland, the only EU member country to share a land border with the U.K. Any habits checks or other barriers along the imperceptible frontier would hammer the Irish economy, and may undermine Northern Ireland’s peace process.
German Chancellor Angela Merkel visited Dublin Thursday for Brexit discussions with Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar.
With passions running high both inside and outside Parliament, authorities warned politicians to tone down their rhetoric.
Martin Hewitt, chairman of the National Police Chiefs’ Council, said that the mood was”amazingly febrile.”
“But I think there’s a responsibility on those individuals that have a stage and also have a voice, to communicate in a means that is temperate and isn’t at all moving to inflame people’s perspectives,” he said.
___
Follow AP’s full coverage of Brexit in: https://www.apnews.com/Brexit Latest News

title: AP Explains tough Australian social media Legislation works
content:
United Services Automobile Association Acquires 4,107 Shares of Mercer International Inc. (MERC) AP Explains tough Australian social media Legislation works April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on AP Explains tough Australian social media Legislation works - Filed Under - by Patrick Bannon Tweet
Australia hopes its new legislation that threaten prison and important fines for social network executives that fail to swiftly remove livestreaming will become a model for other nations.
The government has explained its response to the March 15 gun massacre at legislating the behaviour of social media and internet platforms, in which 50 Muslims were murdered by an Australian in New Zealand because of world-first. Get alerts:
Critics argue if similar legislation aren’t adopted by other countries that social networking giants could pull from Australia. Additionally, there are concerns from exposing atrocities that the law could cause media censorship and stop whistleblowers. Here is a look at the problems it hopes to overcome and the legislation:
___
THE NEW ZEALAND MASSACRE’S AFTERMATH
A white supremacist utilized a helmet-mounted camera since he took on worshippers broadcast live on Facebook. Before responding facebook livestreamed the massacre without interruption to get 17 minutes. Facebook stated it eliminated 1.5 million movies of the shootings through the first 24 hours afterward. The government asserts that social networking firms will need to do much more to exclude content. law not covers the sharing of this movie between users who followed the livestreaming.
____
How Can SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORM SUCH AS FACEBOOK COMMIT A CRIME
Internet service providers and providers of hosting content or services have perpetrated a crime if they fail to eliminate”abhorrent violent substance expeditiously.” The material needs to be accessible from Australia. “Abhorrent violent substance” is described as acts of murder, terrorism, attempted murder, rape, torture and kidnapping. The substance has to he recorded by the perpetrator of an accomplice or this offense for the legislation to apply.
The definition excludes sports such as boxing processes and acts which are violent but consensual. The material can be just sound audio-visual, or visual. It recorded or can be livestreamed and may include pictures taken from movie. “Expeditiously” is not defined. That would be determined by a jury. Corporations may be fined AU$10.5 million ($7.5 million) or 10 percent of their platform’s annual turnover, whichever amount is larger.
___
There are defenses where the content relates to an information report that’s in a court proceeding the public interest, research or an artistic work. The attorney general has the discretion to prevent prosecutions. The government asserts the operations of classic media are unlikely to be effected. Latest News

title: The Newest: Tokyo detention Centre confirms Ghosn is inside
content:
The Latest on the criminal case from Nissan’s former Chairman Carlos Ghosn (all times local): Get alerts:
1 p.m.
A Tokyo detention centre has confirmed that the former Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn has been arrested within the facility following arrest over his allegations. Tokyo Detention House official Takao Sekihara verified Ghosn was inside Thursday afternoon.
Tokyo prosecutors said Ghosn arrest was based on suspicion that he diverted $5 million out of funds which were relayed into a dealership from a Nissan subsidiary abroad.
The arrest comes a month after the release on bond of Ghosn from the arrests while he led the Japanese automaker, related to misconduct.
An analysis by Nissan Motor Co.’s French alliance partner Renault has focused on payments to a dealership at Oman in which a number of the cash is suspected of having been channeled for Ghosn’s individual use.
Ghosn insisted on his innocence.
___
11:30 a.m.
Tokyo prosecutors state the most recent arrest of Nissan Chairman Carlos Ghosn was predicated on suspicion that he redirected $5 million which were relayed to an dealership from a Nissan subsidiary.
TV footage Thursday morning revealed officials entering Ghosn’s flat, and going into the prosecutors’ office a month later Ghosn was released on bond from the arrests while he led the Japanese automaker related to financial misconduct.
In a statement Ghosn ardently declared that his innocence. He was arrested in November on behalf of under-reporting his compensation.
The prosecutors said that the redirected money is supposed of going into a business Ghosn virtually ran. Oman was not mentioned by the statement Thursday issued. However, an investigation with Nissan Motor Co.’s French cooperation partner Renault has focused on obligations to a dealership at Oman where a few of the cash is suspected of having been channeled for Ghosn’s individual use.
___
10 a.m.
The former Chairman Carlos Ghosn of nissan says by Tokyo prosecutors investigating him for alleged financial 23, he has been detained a moment.
The prosecutors said that they could issue a statement soon but declined comment. TV footage showed officials entering Ghosn’s apartment in Tokyo and a car afterwards going into the prosecutors’ office.
Ghosn declared his innocence and had strong words regarding his detention in a statement issued by his family’s spokesman. The spokesman would not be identified due to the sensitivity of the subject.
It stated:”My arrest that morning is outrageous and random. It’s part of another effort by some people at Nissan by misleading the prosecutors, to silence me. Why arrest me try to break me? I won’t be broken. I am innocent of those groundless accusations and charges .”
Ghosn was arrested in December, every one prolonging his pretrial detention.
___
7:20 a.m.
The former Chairman Carlos Ghosn of Nissan has been obtained by japanese prosecutors for questioning barely a month after he was released on bail ahead of his trial on misconduct charges.
Japanese TV footage revealed officials entering Ghosn’s flat in Tokyo Thursday, and a vehicle later going into the prosecutors’ office.
He may confront what will be his fourth arrest under law. He was first arrested in November on charges of under-reporting his settlement. He was re-arrested twice in December, including on breach of trust charges. Detentions are prolonged by the arrests without trial.
The most recent charge seems to be related to the investigation by Nissan Motor Co.’s French alliance partner Renault concerning payments in Oman into some significant dealership, a few of which can be suspected of being steered for Ghosn’s personal use. Latest News

FGL Company Profile

It also provides reinsurance on asset intensive, long duration life, and annuity liabilities, such as fixed, deferred and payout annuities, long-term care, group long-term disability, and cash value life insurance. The company sells its products through independent agents, managing general agents, and specialty brokerage firms, as well as various institutional markets. Harley-Davidson, Inc primarily manufactures and sells cruiser and touring motorcycles. The company operates in two segments, Motorcycles & Related Products, and Financial Services. The Motorcycles & Related Products segment designs, manufactures, and sells at wholesale on-road Harley-Davidson motorcycles, as well as motorcycle parts, accessories, general merchandise, and related services.

title: Financial Survey: BANCO BRADESCO/S (BBDO) and Eagle Financial Services (EFSI)
content:
N/A
Dividends
BANCO BRADESCO/S pays an annual dividend of $0.04 per share and has a dividend yield of 0.5%. Eagle Financial Services pays an annual dividend of $0.96 per share and has a dividend yield of 3.1%. BANCO BRADESCO/S has increased its dividend for 5 consecutive years.
BANCO BRADESCO/S Company Profile
Banco Bradesco SA engages in the provision of financial and insurance services. It operates through Banking, and Insurance segments. The Banking segment includes banking activities. The Insurance segment covers auto, health, life, accident and property insurance, and pension plans aw well as capitalization bonds. The company was founded by Amador Aguiar on March 10, 1943 and is headquartered in Osasco, Brazil.
Eagle Financial Services Company Profile
Eagle Financial Services, Inc. operates as the bank holding company for Bank of Clarke County that provides various retail and commercial banking services in the Shenandoah Valley and Northern Virginia. The company offers deposit products, such as checking, NOW, money market, and regular savings accounts; and demand and time deposits. It also provides one-to-four-family residential real estate, commercial real estate, construction and land development, mortgage, and commercial and industrial loans, as well as secured and unsecured consumer loans, which include personal installment loans, personal lines of credit, automobile loans, and credit card loans. In addition, the company offers ATM and debit cards; and telephone, Internet, and mobile banking services. Further, it provides personal and retirement plan services, including serving as agent for bill paying and custody of assets, as investment manager with full authority or advisor, as trustee or co-trustee for trusts under will or under agreement, as trustee of life insurance trusts, as guardian or committee, as agent under a power of attorney, as executor or co-executor for estates, as custodian or investment advisor for individual retirement plans, and as trustee or trust advisor for corporate retirement plans. Additionally, the company offers investment services comprising tax-deferred annuities, IRAs and rollovers, mutual funds, retirement plans, college savings plans, life insurance, long term care insurance, fixed income investing, brokerage CDs, and full service or discount brokerage services; non-deposit investment products offered through a third party provider; and title insurance products. As of December 31, 2017, it operated 12 full-service branches; and 1 drive-through only facility in the Virginia communities of Berryville, Winchester, Boyce, Stephens City, Purcellville, Leesburg, and Ashburn, as well as 13 ATM locations. The company was founded in 1881 and is headquartered in Berryville, Virginia. About Mercer International
Mercer International Inc, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells northern bleached softwood Kraft (NBSK) pulp in the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Pulp and Wood Products. It produces NBSK pulp primarily from wood chips and pulp logs; carbon neutral or green energy using carbon-neutral bio-fuels, such as black liquor and wood waste; and tall oil for use as a chemical additive and green energy source.

title: Asia shares Japan gains after wobbles on Wall Street
content:
Gold Poker (GPKR) 1-Day Trading Volume Hits $9,158.00 Asia shares Japan gains after wobbles on Wall Street April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on Asia shares Japan gains after wobbles on Wall Street - Filed Under - by Jeff Wilder Tweet
Shares were mixed in Asia together with Chinese markets, on Friday.
Japan’s Nikkei 225 index added 0.3percent to 21,794.37 while the Kospi at South Korea was flat at 2,206.76. Shares fell 0.9% in New Zealand along with the S&P ASX in Australia fell 0.8% to 6,128.60. Get alerts:
Overnight, Wall Street had another day of investing. The market streak was nudged by gains . Markets have been wobbly during the week as investors wait for the U.S. administration’s jobs report Friday and prepare for a new form of corporate earnings reports next week.
New government statistics on Thursday fell to some implies in hiring after a weak February Friday’s jobs report will likely show a dip, said chief equity strategist at Federated Investors, Phil Orlando.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average gained 0.6% to 26,384.63.
The Nasdaq dropped 0.1 percent,to 7,891.78, while the Russell 2000 index of smaller company stocks chosen up 0.4 percent, to 1,567.49.
Indicators in Europe finished mostly lower.
Investors are also keeping a close watch on the latest rounds of U.S.-China transaction negotiations.
President Donald Trump said Thursday that the two sides were”rounding the flip” in the talks, which resumed Wednesday in Washington.
No details were declared however, Trump stated after meeting with Chinese Vice Premier Liu He “something monumental” may be announced within weeks.
Liu, China’s top trade negotiator, told Trump that”for your direct involvement, we have good progress.”
The dispute over technology policy, cast a pall on the outlook for the market and between tariffs has rattled markets.
CURRENCIES: The dollar climbed to 111.71 Japanese yen by 111.58 yen. The euro weakened to $1.1225 from $1.1240.
It dropped 0.6percent to settle at $62.10 a barrel on Thursday. Brent crude, used to cost international oils, drop 12 pennies to $69.13 each barrel. Latest News

Mobile Mini is committed to providing the most secure and convenient storage, tank and pump solutions. About Mobile Mini

title: White House pushes back request for Trump tax Types
content:
Zacks Investment Research Upgrades PBF Logistics (PBFX) to “Hold” White House pushes back request for Trump tax Types April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on White House pushes back request for Trump tax Types - Filed Under - by Tyrone Williams Tweet
The White House said Thursday that Democratic attempts to obtain President Donald Trump’s tax documents are”political games.”
A House committee chairman formally asked as Democrats try to shed light on his complicated financial dealings and conflicts of interest, the IRS Wednesday to provide six years of Trump’s individual tax returns and the yields for a number of his companies rates. Get alerts:
The request Massachusetts Rep. Richard Neal, who directs the tax-writing House Ways and Means Committee, is the very first such requirement for a sitting president’s taxation advice in 45 years. The unprecedented move is likely to put off a massive legal battle involving Democrats controlling the House and the Trump government. Neal made the petition Wednesday in a letter to IRS Commissioner Charles Rettig, asking for company returns and Trump’s private for 2013 through 2018. He requested for the documents at seven days, placing.
Trump told reporters Wednesday he”would not be inclined” to supply his tax returns to the committee. White House press secretary Sarah Sanders said Thursday morning that the White House”is not interested in playing a lot of political games such as the Democrats in Congress definitely want to spend their time performing “
Asked again later to Neal’s demand, Trump didn’t supply an immediate response.
“They will talk to my attorneys; they’ll speak to the attorney general,” Trump said at the White House, referring to Attorney General William Barr, whom he said.
Justice Department spokeswoman Kerri Kupec fell to comment.
Democrats insist that obtaining Trump’s tax filings falls within their mandate of oversight. Republicans have denounced this as a political witch hunt and privacy concerns that were invoked.
“We have completed the necessary groundwork for a request of this size, and I am sure we are within our legitimate legislative, legal and supervision faith,” Neal said in a statement Wednesday evening.
Rep. Kevin Brady of Texas, the senior Republican on the Ways and Means panel, denounced the move as”a misuse of this tax-writing committees’ statutory authority.”
“Weaponizing our nation’s tax code by targeting political foes puts a dangerous precedent and weakens Americans’ privacy rights,” Brady wrote in a letter Wednesday to Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin, who oversees the IRS. “As you know, by legislation all Americans have a fundamental right into the privacy of the personal information found in their own tax returns”
Louisiana Rep. Steve Scalise, the No. 2 House GOP leader, said”lots of Americans are shocked” which Congress can examine tax returns,”whether it’s a blue collar employee or president of the USA.”
The legal battle set to ensue could take years to solve, possibly extending beyond the 2020 presidential elections.
Trump broke with years of tradition by refusing to release his income tax filings throughout his 2016 campaign. He’s said they won’t be released by him because he is being audited, even though IRS officials also have stated citizens under audit are free to release their returns. Trump maintained at a news conference after the November election which the figures are too complicated for individuals to understand.
The IRS has a coverage of auditing the tax returns of all sitting presidents and vice presidents,”however little is understood about the efficacy of this application,” Neal said in the announcement. “Despite the American people, the Ways and Means Committee must ascertain whether this policy is being followedclosely, and if so, whether these audits are conducted completely and appropriately”
Neal continued,”To be able to fairly make that determination, we have to obtain President Trump’s tax returns and also examine if the IRS is doing out its duties.”
Neal is one of just three congressional officers authorized to make a request to the Treasury secretary for anyone’s tax returns. A rarely used 1924 law says that the Treasury chief”shall furnish” the requested material to members of the Ways and Means Committee for them to examine closed doors.
A spokesman for Mnuchin did not respond to requests for comment.
Mnuchin suggested in testimony to Congress last month he would shield the privacy of Trump when the House Democrats asked his tax returns. “We shall inspect the petition and we’ll adhere to the law… and we’ll protect the president as we’d protect any citizen” regarding their right to privacy, Mnuchin said.
___
Associated Press writers Jill Colvin, Alan Fram, Mary Clare Jalonick, Darlene Superville and Eric Tucker contributed to this report. Latest News

title: The Latest: Elaine Wynn testifies about misconduct claims
content:
6:10 p.m. Get alerts:
Elaine Wynn is defending her decision to not disclose to Massachusetts authorities a $7.5 million reimbursement her ex-husband Steve Wynn left into a former worker who accused him of rape.
The state’s gaming commission is holding hearings on what firm leaders knew about allegations of sexual misconduct against Steve Wynn since it believes the fate of the corporation’s license and its $2.6 billion Encore Boston Harbor resort. Steve Wynn has denied the allegations.
She also told the commission that she depended upon the business’s lawyers to decide what ought to be disclosed to authorities as the company sought a casino license .
Wynn says she advised the company’s lawyer in 2009 about the 2005 settlement. Board members say they didn’t understand about the settlement until 2016.
___
11:45 a.m.
Massachusetts gaming authorities are questioning Wynn Resorts leaders about what they knew about allegations of sexual misconduct.
The state’s gambling commission is currently resuming its questioning of CEO Matt Maddox on Thursday. Maddox is a close confidant of firm founder Steve Wynn. In addition, it is anticipated to question Wynn’s ex-wife Elaine Wynn, who is a shareholder.
It’s the third and final day of public hearings as regulators weigh whether the organization is appropriate to hold a state casino license. There is A written decision expected later and has implications for Encore Boston Harbor, the Boston-area hotel the company expects to open in June.
The commission received a report that concluded company executives concealed allegations from Steve Wynn. The allegations have been denied by him. Latest News

content:
Jury.Online Token Reaches Market Capitalization of $145,778.00 (JOT) Kinross Gold (KGC) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on Kinross Gold (KGC) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research - Filed Under - by Trevor Kearing Tweet
Zacks Investment Research cut shares of Kinross Gold (NYSE:KGC) (TSE:K) from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research note issued to investors on Wednesday morning, Zacks.com reports.
According to Zacks, “Kinross is making steady progress in advancing the projects that provide it strong growth profile among leading gold producers. The Tasiast expansion is expected to contribute to growth in the future. Also, it is focused on managing costs and improving cash flow. However, Kinross remains exposed to a volatile gold price environment. The company needs to improve its reserve base significantly for future growth. Higher cost of sales is another concern. Kinross has also underperformed the industry it belongs to over a year.” Get Kinross Gold alerts:

title: 3M (MMM) Cut to “Sell” at Zacks Investment Research
content:
Rexnord (RXN) Cut to Hold at Zacks Investment Research 3M (MMM) Cut to “Sell” at Zacks Investment Research April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on 3M (MMM) Cut to “Sell” at Zacks Investment Research - Filed Under - by Latisha Jones Tweet
Zacks Investment Research downgraded shares of 3M (NYSE:MMM) from a hold rating to a sell rating in a report issued on Tuesday morning, Zacks.com reports.
According to Zacks, “In the past three months, 3M's shares have underperformed the industry. Also, it looks significantly overvalued compared with the industry over the same time frame. For 2019, the company lowered the earnings projection from $10.60-$11.05 to $10.45-$10.90 per share and net sales growth guidance from 2-4% to 1-4%. Foreign currency translation is predicted to adversely influence sales by 1%. In addition, we believe that rising costs, if not checked, will continue to weigh over the company's profitability in the upcoming quarters. Also, the company invests significantly in R&D to locally develop and manufacture products, which in turn is likely to put pressure on its finances and hence might impact profitability. Further, analysts have become increasingly bearish on the company in the past 7 days.” Get 3M alerts:
Several other research analysts have also issued reports on the stock. JPMorgan Chase & Co. lowered their price target on shares of 3M from $158.00 to $154.00 and set an underweight rating for the company in a report on Friday, March 29th. title: PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust (PMT) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research
content:
Rexnord (RXN) Cut to Hold at Zacks Investment Research PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust (PMT) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust (PMT) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research - Filed Under - by Latisha Jones Tweet
Zacks Investment Research lowered shares of PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust (NYSE:PMT) from a strong-buy rating to a hold rating in a report released on Wednesday morning, Zacks.com reports.
According to Zacks, “PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust is a real estate investment trust. The Company operates as a specialty finance company that will invest primarily in residential mortgage loans and mortgage-related assets. The company seeks to acquire primarily troubled home mortgage loans and mortgage-backed securities from FDIC liquidations of failed banks, US Treasury Legacy Loans Program auctions, and direct acquisitions from mortgage and insurance companies and foreign banks. The Company’s objective is to provide risk-adjusted returns to its investors over the long-term, primarily through dividends and secondarily through capital appreciation. The Company focuses on investing in mortgage loans, a substantial portion of which may be distressed and acquired at discounts to their unpaid principal balances. PennyMac is managed by investment adviser PNMAC Capital Management and offers primary and special loan servicing through PennyMac Loan Services. “ Get PennyMac Mortgage Investment Trust alerts:

title: AngioDynamics (ANGO) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research
content:
Caledonia Mining Co. Plc (CMCL) Declares $0.07 Dividend AngioDynamics (ANGO) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on AngioDynamics (ANGO) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research - Filed Under - by Trevor Kearing Tweet
Zacks Investment Research cut shares of AngioDynamics (NASDAQ:ANGO) from a hold rating to a sell rating in a research note released on Friday morning, Zacks.com reports.
According to Zacks, “AngioDynamics exited the fiscal third quarter on a tepid note, with earnings and revenues missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate. Headwinds faced by the company’s Venous Insufficiency business and sluggish show by radiofrequency ablation products raise concerns. Additionally, PICC revenues dipped in the reported quarter. On the positive side, the company continues to gain from its core VIT business unit, which witnessed solid growth on the back of impressive performance at the Fluid Management and AngioVac units. Recent acquisitions of BioSentry and RadiaDyne are proving favorable for the company at the moment. AngioDynamics announced that it has received an approval from the U.S. FDA to initiate a clinical study for treating stage III pancreatic cancer. The company also announced that the FDA has granted an expanded 510(k) clearance for its OARtrac Radiation Dose Monitoring System for use in cancer treatments.” Get AngioDynamics alerts:
Several other equities analysts have also weighed in on the stock. Canaccord Genuity upped their price objective on shares of AngioDynamics from $20.00 to $23.00 and gave the company a hold rating in a report on Monday, January 7th. One research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, two have assigned a hold rating, one has assigned a buy rating and one has issued a strong buy rating to the company. AngioDynamics currently has an average rating of Hold and an average target price of $23.50. The company has a quick ratio of 1.86, a current ratio of 2.68 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.23. The company has a market capitalization of $854.20 million, a PE ratio of 31.01 and a beta of 0.75. AngioDynamics has a twelve month low of $18.11 and a twelve month high of $25.48.
AngioDynamics (NASDAQ:ANGO) last issued its quarterly earnings results on Tuesday, April 2nd. The medical instruments supplier reported $0.19 EPS for the quarter, missing the Zacks’ consensus estimate of $0.22 by ($0.03). The firm had revenue of $86.34 million for the quarter, compared to the consensus estimate of $88.30 million. AngioDynamics had a net margin of 1.30% and a return on equity of 5.41%. The business’s revenue was up 3.0% compared to the same quarter last year. During the same period last year, the company posted $0.23 EPS. As a group, research analysts forecast that AngioDynamics will post 0.85 EPS for the current fiscal year.

About AngioDynamics
AngioDynamics, Inc designs, manufactures, and sells various medical, surgical, and diagnostic devices for the treatment of peripheral vascular disease, vascular access, and for use in oncology and surgical settings in the United States and internationally. The company provides AngioVac venous drainage system that includes venous drainage cannula for the removal of fresh, soft thrombi, or emboli during extracorporeal bypass; and cardiopulmonary bypass circuit for use in procedures during extracorporeal circulatory support.

title: Rexnord (RXN) Cut to Hold at Zacks Investment Research
content:
Sociall 24 Hour Volume Hits $134.00 (SCL) Rexnord (RXN) Cut to Hold at Zacks Investment Research April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on Rexnord (RXN) Cut to Hold at Zacks Investment Research - Filed Under - by Tyrone Williams Tweet
Zacks Investment Research downgraded shares of Rexnord (NYSE:RXN) from a buy rating to a hold rating in a research note released on Tuesday morning, Zacks.com reports.
According to Zacks, “In the past three months, Rexnord's shares have outperformed the industry. In third-quarter fiscal 2019, the company's earnings surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 17.5% while revenues met estimates. In fiscal 2019, it expects to gain from solid product portfolio, strengthening end markets, supply-chain optimization and footprint-repositioning programs (SCOFR) as well as inorganic activities. The Centa Power buyout is expected to boost the company's Process and Motion Control segment while proceeds of the divestment of VAG operations can be used for debt reduction. Core sales growth is predicted to be in a mid-single-digit range (the upper half). However, rising costs and expenses remain concerns. The stock looks relatively leveraged than the industry. Also, Rexnord's lower cash ratio indicates its inability to pay off short-term liabilities. Earnings estimates for fiscal 2020 remained unchanged in the past 60 days.” Get Rexnord alerts:
A number of other equities analysts also recently issued reports on the company.
